text: The Opel Adam is a car produced by the German carmaker Opel. It was made between 2012 and 2019. It was named after its founder Adam Opel and is sold in the UK as a Vauxhall. It's known for having many personalisation options. Production ended in 2019 after a single generation. Adam Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Opel Adam
